live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
58509.summary: Some customers in the Mt Pleasant area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58509.title: Mar 2 - Vancouver (Mt Pleasant) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 12:57 MT.
58513.summary: Some customers in the London Road area of Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58513.title: Mar 2 - Lethbridge (London Road) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
